item.title: Bruschetta
item.description: A simple and flavorful appetizer. It takes 20 minutes total and it's the perfect starter for a special occasion. And now would be a good time to use good quality extra virgin olive oil, because it will make all the difference. I have been using this recipe for a while, that is the result of several recipes put together. Ingredients (4 servings) 1 loaf of day-old bread 1 medium size tomato 75g fresh mozzarella 1 garlic clove olive oil,Â vinegar, salt, basil, q.
